If you think that's stupid there was once a episode of CSI where they had a person using second life and had a scene where the officer's avatar was chasing another person's avatar, I shit you not.  The reason why I remember that was that it was so incredibly dumb that it was forever burned in the back of my mind as the single dumbest moment on crime shows ever.[/bq]
*I Remember this episode*

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c08e926368724b008c0100#post_54c08e926368724b008c0100
[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c08dda6368722b495c2500#post_54c08dda6368722b495c2500
It was a 'pound' cake.[/bq]
*IT'S THE RADICAL CAKE SWEET THE NATION AND DESTROYING THE BOGUS OTHER POUND CAKES IN THE PROCCESS!  NEW "EXTREME FLAVOR(TM)" POUND CAKE WITH A SURPRISE IN EVERY CAKE!  JUST LISTEN TO THESE HAPPY CUSTOMERS!*
Customer 1, "I got a punching bag and a broken jaw; thanks *EXTREME FLAVOR(TM) POUND CAKE*!"
Customer 2, "I got boxing gloves and a black eye; thanks *EXTREME FLAVOR(TM) POUND CAKE*!"
Customer 3, "Oh boy my mom got me *EXTREME FLAVOR(TM) POUND CAKE* I wonder what prize it has?"
R. Lee Ermey, *"EVERY BOX COMES WITH A SURPRISE GIFT AND THE EXTREME FLAVOR A SCUMBAG LIKE YOU CAN'T HANDLE CAUSE YOU CAN'T HANDLE THE FLAVOR!  DO YOU THINK YOU CAN HANDLE THE FLAVOR?!"*
Customer 3, "SIR YES SIR!"
R. Lee Ermey, *"BULLSHIT!  WHOSE THE SLIMY LITTLE COMMUNIST SHIT THAT THINKS THEY CAN HANDLE THE FUCKING TASTE?  WAS IT YOU TWINKLE TOES?!  YOU CAN'T HANDLE THE FUCKING FLAVOR!"*



I bet it's pretty apparent what movie I've just watched.
